turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I'd like to order a Iced Caffe Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any syrups or whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like Sugar Free Vanilla syrup and I would like whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond Milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, which starbucks would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The starbucks in Encino, California on Ventura & Louise

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK I found the starbucks 17308 Ventura Blvd. Encino, CA 91316, is this correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I believe so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need directions to this location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so to confirm you have ordered a Venti Iced Caffe Latte with Sugar Free Vanilla Syrup, Whipped Cream and Almond milk to be picked up at the Starbucks located at 17308 Ventura Blvd. Encino, CA 91316. Is that correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can I assist you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the hours of that particular location today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are open from 4:00 am to 9:30 pm today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, Goodbye.

items.name: Venti Iced Caffe Latte with Sugar Free Vanilla Syrup, Whipped Cream and Almond milk
